channel.title: Command so that when you click a object is shows its id?
channel.description: Anyone know a command that when you click a object it sends a message with its id and then another command to turn it that command off? Its a Delta source.

item.title: Command so that when you click a object is shows its id?
item.dc:creator: @Olzax Olzax
item.description:
@Olzax wrote:

That idea seems hard. How about a useless item you use like a skull, use it on the object and you get id. UselessItem->Use->Santa Hat
“That object’s id is ‘1050’.”

As for how you do this, Idk.

Read full topic
item.source: Command so that when you click a object is shows its id?
